com.viewpagerindicator

Class IconPageIndicator

  • java.lang.Object
    • HorizontalScrollView
      • com.viewpagerindicator.IconPageIndicator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.support.v4.view.ViewPager.OnPageChangeListener, PageIndicator

    public class IconPageIndicator
extends HorizontalScrollView
implements PageIndicator
    This widget implements the dynamic action bar tab behavior that can change across different configurations or circumstances.

      • setCurrentItem

        public void setCurrentItem(int item)
        Description copied from interface: PageIndicator

        Set the current page of both the ViewPager and indicator.

        This must be used if you need to set the page before the views are drawn on screen (e.g., default start page).

        Specified by:
        setCurrentItem in interface PageIndicator
